message: Hello Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. I'm happy to start the negotiations by offering it to you at $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its unique value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $950,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the value of this product is significantly higher than your proposed price. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your perspective, but I would like to propose a price of $1,000,000 for the product.
